title: Agitation site re-named as ’Gota Go Gama’ by protestors
body_lines: The agitation site set up near the Presidential Secretariat has been re-named as the 'Gota Go Gama' by the protestors who are demanding President Gotabaya Rajapaksa to step down amidst the spiraling crisis.
Thousands of people gathered outside the Presidential Secretariat over the weekend demanding the President to resign with many protestors putting up tents to stay overnight.

On Monday morning, the protestors who remained on the agitation site, camping in tents, put up a cardboard sign re-naming the agitation site as Gota Go Gama, continuing their calls for the President to resign.
